Name: Debris Rangefinder
Description:
A single-use device for locating the wreckage of starships in deep space.

Select the Rangefinder and Scan for Debris ([E]) to begin the location process.

Name: Lost Angler's Rig
Description:
A versatile piece of angling equipment, enabling the user to fish in a variety of water conditions. This rig was once owned by the legendary Lost Angler.

Access the fishing rig by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and cast your line into a body of water with ATTACK. With a fish hooked, press and hold ATTACK to haul in your catch.

Name: Hazard Protection
Description:
The Exosuit's Hazard Protection system continually monitors and stabilises the user's environment. 

General reactive protection may be augmented with Environmental Shields, offering increased protection against specific conditions.

The device is charged with sodium-based substances. User is advised that a failure to charge the Hazard Protection system may allow their environment to become incompatible with life.

Name: Life Support
Description:
The core of the Exosuit, the Life Support System continually filters and pumps breathable Oxygen.

In addition to its role in the continued existence of the Exosuit user, the Life Support Unit uses surplus oxygen to generate power for secondary systems, such as the Jetpack, Speed Augmentation and Torch.

Name: Jetpack
Description:
Provides the Exosuit with advanced movement capabilities, including temporary flight.

Control thrust with JUMP. The flightpack uses energy from the Exosuit Life Support system to pressurise and vent bursts of gas, propelling the user into the air.

Jetpack can be temporarily overloaded by gathering Deuterium-rich plants, causing a dramatic increase in available thrust.

Name: Airburst Engine
Description:
A powerful upgrade for the Exosuit Jetpack, allowing limited jetpack recharging while airborne.

Highly efficient compressors fitted around the jetpack exhaust take advantage of the windflow generated by persistent falling, recycling some of that energy into jetpack fuel.

Name: Coolant Network
Description:
User is guarded from extreme heat damage on scorched worlds.

Provides relief from intense atmospheric and solar heat through a threaded dermal distribution network of liquid frenium.

Device is charged by mineral extracts found in hot environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

Name: Thermic Layer
Description:
User is guarded from extreme cold damage on frozen worlds.

Heat capillaries threaded through a user's suit that evenly distributes liquid calidium to maintain a comfortable body temperature.

Device is charged by mineral extracts found in frozen environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

Name: Toxin Suppressor
Description:
User is protected from toxic damage.

Reactive compounds within the Suppressor remove toxic liquids that fall on the user, thereby reducing peril and choking hazards.

Device is charged by mineral extracts found in toxic environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

Name: Radiation Deflector
Description:
User is shielded from radiation damage.

Greatly reduces user peril during the exploration of irradiated worlds. Micro-vibrations increase electromagnetic wave reflection, thereby reducing absorption.

Device is charged by mineral extracts found in radioactive environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

Name: Aeration Membrane
Description:
User is able to swim underwater for extended periods.

Absorbs gases dissolved in water through a membrane contactor that, if user is of a conventionally structured species, is placed over the mouth or facial breathing hole.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

Name: Pressure Membrane
Description:
Extreme pressure environments - such as deep water - cause elevated stress on the Exosuit's oxygen circulation and general life support systems.

Installation of this reinforced pressurisation shell increases efficiency and protection while operating in high-pressure environments.

Name: Personal Refiner
Description:
A compact extension to the Exosuit, installing a small Portable Refiner, accessible directly from the user's Exosuit interface.

Unit requires fuel and is limited to refining one substance at a time.

Name: Personal Refiner Mk 2
Description:
A compact extension to the Exosuit, installing an advanced yet portable Medium Refiner, accessible directly from the user's Exosuit interface.

Unit requires fuel and is able to refine more complex recipes than the standard personal refiner unit.

Name: Haz-mat Gauntlet
Description:
Upgrades the metallic shielding of the Exosuit's gloves.

An advanced blend of reinforced metal and catalytic shielding allows the user to safely handle hazardous substances, as well as perform the necessary feats of strength required to harvest certain farmable flora.

Name: Remembrance
Description: Everything you ever knew is within.

Name: Star Seed
Description:
The smallest of sparks, housed within a containment field of unknown origins.

The seed glows with life, desperate to escape and fulfill its potential.

Name: Mark of the Denier
Description:
A tiny mote of stardust, no more than a speck. On closer examination, its surface is all crystalline shards and distorted crimson geometry.

It flickers with pent-up energy, demanding to be free.

Empower the mark as you discover systems, planets and objects across the universe.

Name: Obsolete Technology
Description:
A piece of technology, corrupted by interference from the Atlas.

Can be recycled for usable components.

Name: Oxygen Rerouter
Description:
Upgrades the Aeration Membrane of the Exosuit to harvest oxygen from the Life Support system in the event of a breathing emergency, allowing the user to resurface and seek conventional fuel supplies.

Note: Long-term conversion of life support energy to breathable gas is not recommended, and may result in life no longer being supported.

Name: Simple Translator
Description:
An automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.

Low memory capacity on this entry-level model limits translation capacity.

Name: Superior Translator
Description:
An automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.

Parallel language processors enable a greater proportion of recorded speech to be translated.

Name: Advanced Translator
Description:
An automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.

A large memory array and overclocked language processors allow the real-time translation of significant chunks of speech.

Name: Artemis' Translator
Description:
An automatic translation device. Device must be calibrated by pre-loading with existing translation data. Device must have network connection to Artemis to function.

Without access to host translation service, on-board circuit allows limited real-time translation of a small number of words.

Name: Visceral Synthesiser
Description:
A piece of otherworldy technology. Its inviting membranes are soft, gel-like, pulsing with a gentle crimson radiance.

Its warm embrace allows the user to extricate any Vile Spawn from the embryotic sacs of Hungering Tendrils.

Name: Archive Bypass Implant
Description:
A biotechnical firewall, developed as a safeguard against textual cognitohazards. It is coated in something slippery, and has started to bubble along the surface.

Embedded beneath the skin, this grants administrative access to ancient forbidden texts bound at a Planetary Archive.
Warning: Do not unbind the forbidden texts. Exposure to forbidden texts carries extreme risk.

Name: Trade Rocket
Description:
A personal rocketry device with a direct link to the Galactic Trade Network. This unit allows the user to load a small spacecraft with goods. Upon launch, the goods will be transported to the nearest trade terminus and automatically sold.

Summon the Trade Rocket using the QUICK_MENU.

Name: Exo-skiff
Description:
A deployable static platform, allowing the user to comfortably survey the seas in any weather. As well as providing a steady and easily accessible fishing spot, the Exo-Skiff also features abundant Cold Storage, granting additional space to store your catch. 

Summon the Exo-Skiff to any suitable body of water using the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

Name: Nutrient Ingestor
Description:
The nutrient ingestor improves exosuit performance via the automatic portioning and processing of various cooked items.

Select Begin Ingestion to commence automatic consumption of supplied ingredients.

Name: Anomaly Suppressor
Description:
As the boundaries of reality begin to weaken, the risk of catastrophic breach anomalies increases.

This device monitors and maintains the local boundary strength, guarding against reality continuity errors. Supply the device with glass to maintain functionality.

Name: Pulse Engine
Description:
Spaceflight propulsion, boosts and on-demand Pulse Jumps through local system.
 
User is advised that Tritium is required to charge Pulse Engine. Tritium is abundant in near-space asteroid fields. Locate Tritium with the starship scanner (SCAN).

Hold PULSEJUMP to engage Pulse Jump.
Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Fuel Spending
Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Speed

Name: Instability Drive
Description:
A highly-advanced upgrade for the Pulse Engine, vastly increasing fuel efficiency.

Tritium supplies are redirected into a cycle of miniature black holes. Resulting micro-gravity fluctuations are harnessed to boost starship propulsion beyond conventional combustion-based approaches.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Fuel Spending

Name: Sub-light Amplifier
Description:
A highly-advanced upgrade for the Pulse Engine, vastly increasing interplanetary speed.

Naturally occuring frameshift effects within the Pulse Engine are amplified by tritium-based resonators, increasing its maximum sub-light speed.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Speed

Name: Flight Assist Override
Description:
This grey-market electronics module disables critical safety and pilot-assistance modules usually baked into the starship's fly-by-wire control system. Despite its dubious legal status and its implication in a series of high-speed asteroid impacts, this module remains popular with smugglers, mercenaries, and others who think of themselves as advanced pilots.

Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the starship to drift during spaceflight.

Name: Photonix Core
Description: Provides increased manoeuvrability and longer boosts during spaceflight.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Fuel Spending

Name: Launch Thruster
Description:
Vital launch and landing gear system.
 
User is advised that specialised, Deuterium-derived fuel is required to recharge thruster. Launch procedures require sufficient fuel levels before activation.
 
Hold THRUST to take off from planet.
Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

Name: Aqua-jets
Description:
An advanced upgrade for the starship's landing system, enabling the ship to land and take off from aquatic surfaces.

A mixture of bespoke jets and re-directed exhaust fans allow the ship to hover just above the water's surface.

Name: Teleport Receiver
Description:
A device that modulates standard starship communication signals to enable the transport of matter as well as data.

Starships fitted with such a device can send and receive products and substances to a user's exosuit over a long distance.

Name: Hyperdrive
Description:
FTL propulsion drive that allows starship to attain warp speed and jump between neighbouring systems.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems through Galactic Map.

Name: Emergency Warp Unit
Description:
A significant upgrade to the Hyperdrive that allows an instantaneous warp even while conventional systems are blocked by starship combat. Access to the emergency warp system is via the Quick Menu.

WARNING: Fast scramble systems mean the user is unable to plot a destination. Uncalculated lightspeed events will damage the unit and require frequent repairs.

Name: Cargo Scan Deflector
Description:
A specially tuned resonance jammer, designed to interfere with the remote cargo scans deployed by system authorities in the search for smuggled goods.

Deploy from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU) while a scan is in progress to deflect the probe. Note: jamming is not 100% effective.

Name: Deflector Shield
Description:
Energy shield that protects spacecraft from laser fire, in-flight projectiles and accidental space debris interaction.

User is advised that catalytic elements are required to recharge device.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's starship inventory.

Name: Rocket Launcher
Description:
A long range starship weapon, capable of delivering a highly explosive torpedo across massive distances.

Note: explosive damage is highly effective against unshielded targets, but ineffective against shielded targets.

Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Weapons Guns Bullets Per Shot

Name: Photon Cannon
Description:
A destructive starship projectile launcher, the weapons system of choice for the interstellar trader and pirate alike.

Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Weapons Guns Bullets Per Shot

Name: Economy Scanner
Description:
An upgrade to the starship's galactic-scale sensors. This device allows the user to access detailed economic data about a system without having to visit. See collected data automatically on the Galaxy Map.

Active the scanner's internal Trade Computer with [E] to search for highly-profitable trading surge events.

Name: Conflict Scanner
Description: An upgrade to the starship's galactic-scale sensors. This device allows the user to access conflict data in the galaxy map, without having to put themselves in harm's way.

Name: Phase Beam
Description:
A high-energy beam weapon for ship-to-ship combat. 

Though vulnerable to overheating, these highly accurate laser weapons can recharge the users's shields by leeching energy from target shield systems.

Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

Name: Positron Ejector
Description:
A powerful starship weapon, capable of delivering extreme destruction at close range. 

Note: these particles show decreased effectiveness against shielded targets.

Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Weapons Guns Bullets Per Shot

Name: Infra-knife Accelerator
Description:
A rapid fire starship weapon that launches superheated globes of liquid metal at hostile targets. These projectiles are extremely effective against unshielded starship hulls.

Note: the Accelerator's internal components are vulnerable to rapid overheating. Sustained burst fire is not recommended.

Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Weapons Guns Bullets Per Shot

Name: Cyclotron Ballista
Description:
A powerful ship-to-ship weapon, flinging plasmatic balls of ionising radiation towards the selected target. These projectiles can disable starship engines, leaving the target vulnerable to attack from other weapons.

These charged particles are extremely effective against starship shields, and considerably weaker against the metal armour of a ship's hull.

Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Weapons Guns Bullets Per Shot

Name: Freighter Hyperdrive
Description: FTL propulsion drive that allows starship to attain warp speed and jump between neighbouring systems.

Name: Warp Core Resonator
Description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.

Quantum resonation improves the robustness of the drive during FTL travel, granting the ability to leap to stars previously out of reach.

Name: Plasmatic Warp Injector
Description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.

Hyperdrive benefits from advanced fusion that brings starship to higher warp speed and intensity. User's craft will become able to leap deeper into space, and into more distant planetary systems.

Name: Reality De-threader
Description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.

Uncapped, yet stabilised, fusion systems are threaded into user's hyperdrive. Allows starship to jump ever longer distances in deep space.

Name: Matter Beam
Description:
A device that modulates standard freighter communication signals to enable the interplanetary transport of matter as well as data.

Freighters fitted with such a device can send and receive products and substances to a user's Exosuit over a long distance.

Name: Interstellar Scanner
Description:
An upgrade to the freighter's galactic-scale sensors.

This device allows the user to access detailed economic and conflict data for a system, even without having previously visited.

Name: Singularity Engine
Description:
An unstable and highly-experimental piece of freighter hyperdrive technology. This extreme gravity device generates a wormhole deep within the freighter's reactor core, inverting the entire vessel and transporting it across the universe.

Speak to the freighter's commander to engage the drive. Warning: destination is not controllable.

Name: Atmospheric Control Unit
Description:
A critical freighter subsystem, vital for maintaining a habitable and safe environment for all on-board organic lifeforms.

Capable of generated a limited breathable atmosphere even when damaged or unpowered, but only for a short period of time.

Name: Hull Fracture
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Rusted Circuits
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Shattered Bulwark
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Radiation Leak
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Containment Failure
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Damaged Gears
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Hydraulics Damage
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Exploded Panel
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Corroded Tanks
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Burnt-out Compressor
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Scorched Plating
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Melted Fuel Cell
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Hull Fracture
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Rusted Circuits
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Hydraulics Damage
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Corroded Tanks
Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

Name: Pulsing Heart
Description:
A fibrous metallic superstructure binds this warm and vital organ with the core of the ship. Without it, the ship would be nothing, a lifeless husk.

Hold PULSEJUMP to ask the heart to initiate a Pulse Jump.
Hold BOOST to request a speed boost.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Fuel Spending
Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Speed

Name: Neural Assembly
Description:
An array of distributed neurons, fused to a board of metallic strands. Complex patterns of electrical impulses weave their way across the surface, knotting each ship system together.
 
Hold THRUST to inquire if the ship would like to take off.

Name: Singularity Cortex
Description:
A complex bio-metallic stem plugged directly into an antimatter heart. Registers high activity during interstellar jumps. It appears to delight in the complex calculations required for FTL travel.

Access long-distance navigation systems through Galactic Map. Keep the ship happy by regularly jumping between systems.

Name: Scream Suppressor
Description:
This small extension to the ship's automated defense network appears to be its own autonomous organism. A small mouth in the centre of its flesh hungers for Pugneum.

During combat, it seems to hijack the neurological array and prevent fear or pain from traumatising the rest of the ship's body.

Name: Spewing Vents
Description:
A mess of sacs and sphincters, these vents generate and expel globules of plasma. When fused to the weapon systems of the ship, these are super-heated and then expelled at high-pressure.

Press SHIPFIRE to ask if the ship would direct its vents towards the current target.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Weapons Guns Bullets Per Shot

Name: Grafted Eyes
Description:
A complex arrangement of membranes and lens, fused atop a high-energy laser array. Incineration awaits those that meet their stare.
Press SHIPFIRE request the eyes gaze upon nearby targets.

Name: Neural Shielding
Description:
A beautiful living weave of nanotubes, laced through the vessel's neural assembly. This structure can be energised as the ship deems fit, creating a field that blocks hostile cargo probes.

Use the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU) while a scan is in progress to ask that the ship might block the scan.

Name: Chloroplast Membrane
Description:
An infusion of cyanobacteria fills the membrane, which rests just beneath the ship's translucent dermal layer.

The membrane will recharge the Neural Assembly automatically when exposed to sunlight.

Name: Wormhole Brain
Description:
The wormhole brain permits the ship vision of systems far beyond its own experience.  It consists of strands of neural matter, wrapped around a micro-singularity and tethered directly to the ship's visual cortex.

Detailed economic and conflict data will become available on the Galaxy Map, should the ship permit it.

Name: Saline Carapace
Description:
A salty membrane encases the ship, dramatically increasing its natural buoyancy.

The carapace will allow the vessel to float, making water landings possible.

Name: Grasping Tendrils
Description:
Filaments of sinew and neuron warp and weave across the ship, their complex geometry darting between the visible world and some unfathomable dimension beyond.

These tendrils reach across time and space, searching out a long-distance link between the vessel and their target's Exosuit inventory.

Name: Advanced Launch System
Description:
A custom-made launch control system for high-performance starships. Sensitive gyroscopes and specialised control circuits plot custom take-off routines for increased launch speed and efficiency.
 
Specialised, deuterium-derived fuel is required to recharge thruster. Launch procedures require sufficient fuel levels before activation.
 
Hold THRUST to take off from planet. Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

Name: Waveform Engine
Description:
A highly-tuned version of the conventional starship Pulse Engine. Wavefront occupancy has been pushed to the limit, creating a pulse experience that is both efficient and highly responsive.

User is advised that Tritium is required to charge the drive. Tritium is abundant in near-space asteroid fields. Scan (SHIPSCAN) to search for tritium-rich asteroids.

Hold PULSEJUMP to engage Pulse Jump. Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Fuel Spending
Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Speed

Name: Frameshift Catapult
Description:
This experimental drive augments conventional hyperdrive technology by distorting local geometry at the point of warp initialisation, boosting range and efficiency far beyond standard drives.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems through the Galactic Map.

Name: Pressurisation Capsule
Description:
A critical starship safety feature, vital for extra-orbital flight.

The pressuration capsule is a dedicated unit that both ensures a breathable atmosphere and prevents the catastrophic explosion of unconventional cockpit designs.

Name: Vesper Sail
Description:
A high-performance solar sail, deployed automatically during flight. This advanced propulsion device generates an electric field within the sails themselves, allowing the starship to build momentum from the solar wind.

Offers substantial gains in fuel efficiency and boost performance over conventional engine systems, as well as enabling photovoltaic recharge of the starship's launch systems.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Fuel Spending

Name: Starship Scanner
Description: Starship Scanner

Name: Anti-gravity Well
Description:
Gently detaches the starship from gravitational fields, lifting it toward the stars.
 
The well hungers for pugneum or radiant shards, and must be sufficiently fueled before launch.
 
Hold THRUST to take off from planet.
Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

Name: Luminance Engine
Description:
Aligns the ship's electromagnetic emissions with A T L A S waves, providing basic propulsion and Pulse Jump capability.
 
The sub-light drive hungers for tritium or radiant shards.

Hold PULSEJUMP to engage Pulse Jump.
Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Fuel Spending
Ship Pulse Drive Mini Jump Speed

Name: Crimson Core
Description:
A raw optic organ, red and unblinking. Suspended above the ship's engines, it gazes down tunnels in spacetime, allowing FTL travel between star systems.

Direct the core's attention to remote destinations via the Galactic Map.

Name: Aeron Shield
Description:
A defensive crimson cocoon, obfuscating the ship's physical form and providing protection from collision and laser fire.

The core self-heals over time, but may be quickly replenished with catalytic elements or radiant shards.

Name: Sentinel Cannon
Description:
Sentinel-grade weapons system, engineered for the singular purpose of annihilating rogue ships in violation of system regulations.

Press SHIPFIRE to administer lethal force.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Weapons Guns Bullets Per Shot

Name: Pilot Interface
Description:
This device allows a pilot's brain to interface with the mind of the Sentinel Interceptor, granting the pilot access to ship control systems and external sensors.

The enmeshing of the pilot's mind with that of the vessel is necessary to prevent rejection/consumption of the pilot by the ship's vestigial cockpit.

Name: Analysis Visor
Description:
Specialist Discovery and Survey unit.

Augments standard Scanner capabilities by projecting detailed environmental data directly over the user's visor. Allows the identification of distant points of interest.

The Visor will generate valuable data when used to study flora, fauna and minerals.

Hold AIM to operate. Press ZOOM to zoom.

Name: Scanner
Description:
A Personal Surface Radar augmentation for the Multi-Tool. 

The Scanner releases a high-energy pulse that reveals any critical survival resources in the immediate area. Data is transmitted via the Exosuit directly into the user's visual nervous system.
 
Press SCAN to activate a local scan.

Name: Polyphonic Core
Description:
An attachment for the Multi-Tool Scanner that allows the device to detect and decode the cloaking signal of nearby Autophage units.

Use SCAN to activate the Scanner. As its detector waveform passes over the local area, it will automatically reveal any nearby Autophage entities.

In addition, this device can be used to locate Autophage gatherings. Use Locate Autophage Camp ([LMB]) to pinpoint a planetary gathering of Autophage.

Name: Resonance Amplifier
Description:
An attachment for the Multi-Tool Scanner, designed by Specialist Polo for the detection of atlantideum-infused sentience echoes.

On dissonant worlds, use the Analysis Visor (AIM) to locate sentience echoes. On arrival at an echo site, use SCAN to fully reveal nearby anomalies.

Name: Terrain Manipulator
Description:
Advanced terraforming device. This module overloads existing multi-tool systems, allowing the user to reshape regions as they wish.

Charged with metallic elements.

Name: Personal Forcefield
Description:
On activation, this module draws power from Exosuit Life Support systems to overload the Multi-Tool, distorting the electromagnetic field around the user and creating a powerful personal shield.

While this field offers substantial protection against incoming laser fire, the user is advised that the Multi-Tool cannot be used for other functions while powering the shield.

Name: Cloaking Device
Description:
On activation, this module draws power from Exosuit Life Support systems to manipulate the gravitational field around the user, refracting the light and creating an active camouflage effect.

This temporary effect can be used to escape unwanted hostile attention. WARNING: active camouflage will be aborted upon dramatic Exosuit manoeuvres such as jetpack activation, or by activating Multi-Tool weapons systems.

Name: Combat Scope
Description: A recoil-stabilising weapon scope for precise combat.

Name: Mining Beam
Description:
Multi-Tool Mining Beam powered by Carbon-based Elements. Fire the beam with ATTACK.

Installs focusing optics within the Multi-Tool, allowing it to emit a high-energy beam. The beam is calibrated to excite molecules within common organic or geological objects, allowing it to operate as a highly effective mining device.

WARNING: Destruction of flora, fauna or minerals may attract Sentinel attention.

Name: Advanced Mining Laser
Description:
Replaces standard Mining Beam optics with high-grade Living Glass, allowing the beam to be effective against large and/or rare resource deposits.

The lens adapts automatically to minute fluctuations in the beam waveform, minimising scatter and increasing device mining potential.

Name: Optical Drill
Description:
Wafer-thin lens arrays are arranged in a highly calibrated matrix, focusing the Mining Beam on an atomic level.

This extra precision allows for highly efficient mining. Elements are extracted more efficiently, increasing the yield from items harvested with the Multi-Tool.

Name: Fishing Rig
Description:
A versatile piece of angling equipment, enabling the user to fish in a variety of water conditions.

Access the fishing rig by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and cast your line into a body of water with ATTACK. With a fish hooked, press and hold ATTACK to haul in your catch.

Name: Lost Angler's Rig
Description:
A versatile piece of angling equipment, enabling the user to fish in a variety of water conditions. This rig was once owned by the legendary Lost Angler.

Access the fishing rig by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and cast your line into a body of water with ATTACK. With a fish hooked, press and hold ATTACK to haul in your catch.

Name: Gravitino Coil
Description:
This remarkable technology transforms the Multi-Tool into a powerful kinetic manipulator, capable of attracting and repelling industrial waste via a localised magnetic field.

Access the Gravitino Coil by pressing CYCLEWEAPON, and attract industrial waste with ALTATTACK. Magnetised objects can be launched from the Coil with ATTACK, or gently released with ALTATTACK.

Name: Boltcaster
Description:
Generalist weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.

The Boltcaster reconfigures the Multi-Tool to supercharge Metallic Elements, firing them as high-velocity projectiles capable of causing extreme damage.

Name: Boltcaster Sm
Description:
Boltcaster shots deliver added physical damage upon impact.

Grants additional kinetic energy to the user's ionised plasma distribution systems.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's Multi-Tool inventory.

Name: Plasma Launcher
Description:
High-impact projectile weapon. Launched plasma shells bounce off surfaces until their internal timer triggers a large explosion.
 
Charged with Unstable Plasma. Careless use can result in damage to user.
 
Press ALTATTACK to activate.

Name: Geology Cannon
Description:
Large-bore projectile launcher. Propels plasma shells designed for rapid ground excavation.
 
Charged with Unstable Plasma. Warning: Explosive hole creation may also damage nearby organic matter.
 
Press ALTATTACK to activate.

Name: Paralysis Mortar
Description:
Non-violent projectile weapon. Launched projectiles will incapacitate nearby targets with a burst of electrical energy. Effective against both biological and electronic entities.
 
Charged with Unstable Plasma.
 
Press ALTATTACK to activate.

Name: Blaze Javelin
Description:
Aggressive weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.

The Blaze Javelin delivers instantaneous damage on targets.

Plasma charge process creates an ionised gas arc to propel projectiles at great speed. User will perceive destructive results simultaneous to the pull of the trigger.

Name: Scatter Blaster
Description:
Specialist close combat weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.

The Scatter Blaster reconfigures the Multi-Tool to heat and shatter Metallic Elements, firing them in a wide cone of destruction. Range is limited, but the shrapnel is highly effective at close range.

Name: Pulse Spitter
Description:
Specialist rapid fire weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.

The Pulse Spitter redirects Multi-Tool optics to ionise inserted Metallic Elements. These projectiles are launched in a rapid-fire spread, bombarding potential targets with a wave of high-energy plasma.

Name: Incinerator
Description:
Specialist high temperature weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.

The Incinerator focuses internal lasers onto the naturally-occuring exhaust gases generated by the Multi-Tool. Ignition results in a highly destructive, if short range, inferno.

Name: Neutron Cannon
Description:
A high-energy weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. The Neutron Cannon energises atmospheric particles before propelling them towards hostile targets, delivering significant area damage

Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON. Charge the weapon with ATTACK, then release to unleash a volley of ionised particles.

While the cannon can deliver instantaneous single shots, longer charges will result in significant increases to the speed and volume of released particles.

Name: Voltaic Amplifier
Description:
A generalised upgrade for all Multi-Tool weapon systems, causing its projectiles to resonate dramatically upon impact with any appropriate electromagnetic field.

Will significantly increase the damage dealt to any organic and inorganic entities that are currently stunned.

Name: Short Circuit
Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

Name: Blown Transistor
Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

Name: Damaged Wiring
Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

Name: Leaking Membrane
Description:

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

Name: Failed Resistor
Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

Name: Sentience Resistor
Description:
This Multi-Tool is a piece of hybrid technology, a fusion of crude scrap and a deep, powerful energy - part salvage, part Sentinel, part something undefinable...

This process of recycled fusion was incomplete when this tool was acquired. Use REPAIR to continue repair operations and free this slot for general use.

Name: Discordant Prism
Description:
This Multi-Tool is a piece of hybrid technology, a fusion of crude scrap and a deep, powerful energy - part salvage, part Sentinel, part something undefinable...

This process of recycled fusion was incomplete when this tool was acquired. Use REPAIR to continue repair operations and free this slot for general use.

Name: Corrupted Lens
Description:
This Multi-Tool is a piece of hybrid technology, a fusion of crude scrap and a deep, powerful energy - part salvage, part Sentinel, part something undefinable...

This process of recycled fusion was incomplete when this tool was acquired. Use REPAIR to continue repair operations and free this slot for general use.

Name: Drained Power Core
Description:
This Multi-Tool is a piece of hybrid technology, a fusion of crude scrap and a deep, powerful energy - part salvage, part Sentinel, part something undefinable...

This process of recycled fusion was incomplete when this tool was acquired. Use REPAIR to continue repair operations and free this slot for general use.

Name: Corrupt Module
Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

Name: Loom Damage
Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

Name: Burnt-out Terminal
Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

Name: Failed Resistor
Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

Name: Solar Ray
Description:
A highly specialised addition to the Multi-Tool's mining capabilities, transforming terrain deposits into liquid sun.

A powerful laser array amplifies local solar radiation, allowing for the rapid reconfiguration of nearby mineral ores.

Name: Animus Beam
Description:
A unique overload to the Multi-Tool's standard mining laser. Beam frequency is modulated precisely in a feedback loop with the delta-waves generated by the impact target.

Recordings of the target's experiences are thus etched into tiny fragments of metal and rendered as Fragmented Qualia. Readability of collected fragments is not guaranteed.

Name: Hijacked Laser
Description:
This Multi-Tool is made with material and methods known to no conventional manufacturer, its core a unfathomable array of impossible optics and glassy foam. Nonetheless, there is a layer of recogniseable technology. It shows signs of having been tampered with by an unknown craftsman, who has repurposed its scanner array into a high-powered mining laser.

Powered by Carbon-based Elements. Fire the beam with ATTACK.

Name: Runic Lens
Description:
The geometric heart of this ancient weapon is the Runic Lens. Its impossible geometry not only concentrates light into a high-powered Mining Laser, but can also warp the local electromagnetic field so as to render the user invisible.

Powered by Carbon-based Elements. Fire the beam with ATTACK. Select its secondary cloaking function with CYCLEALTWEAPON and hold ALTATTACK to activate.

Name: Icarus Fuel System
Description:
The Icarus system takes advantage of existing metal panelling, upgrading them into photovoltaic surfaces. This reactive coating generates energy during daylight hours, offsetting fuel consumption.

Enables automatic engine recharging during the day.

Name: Mineral Processing Rig
Description:
A large and powerful refiner unit, designed to be housed within the belly of a Colossus Exocraft.

The unit is able to process the most complex recipes, but requires its own independent fuel source.

Name: Daedalus Engine
Description:
A compact reactor unit, this engine is the heart of the Minotaur. It is mounted on a gyroscope to prevent fuel incidents during rapid movement.

Powered by conventional carbon-base fuels.

Name: Minotaur Radar Array
Description:
A high-detail radar device, capable of upgrading the scanner technology aboard the Minotaur to Analysis Visor levels.

Press SCAN to activate a radar sweep, revealing additional points of interest that cannot be located via a Multi-Tool scanner.

Use the Quick Menu to tune the radar to specific buildings.

Name: Ariadne's Flame
Description:
A series of agile, high-powered jet thrusters mounted to the rear of the rear of the Minotaur. Precise use allows the Minotaur to quickly and powerfully traverse all manner of terrain.

Press and hold JUMP to activate. Limited in-flight control is possible.

Name: Minotaur Laser
Description:
A mounted laser system specifically designed for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

Enables conventional mining operations. Ineffective in combat scenarios.

Name: Precision Minotaur Laser
Description:
An upgrade for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid's laser array system.

Amplifies the power deployed by the mining beam, increasing mining speed and enabling the processing of difficult to mine raw materials.

Name: Minotaur Cannon
Description:
A mounted cannon specifically designed for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

Designed primarily for damage against biological entities and inefficient when deployed as a mining device.

Name: Minotaur Bore
Description:
Adds Terrain Manipulation capability to the laser array of the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

A special mount allows the rapid deployment of a high-energy terrain excavator, without risking clogging the Minotaur's delicate joints and servos with dirt.

Name: Minotaur Ai Pilot
Description:
A semi-autonomous artificial pilot plugin for the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid. Installation allows the Minotaur to traverse planets itself and engage in combat or mining activities to support its primary operator.

The AI pilot will always cede control to the primary operator when they enter the cockpit.

Piloting routines are highly localised. It is incapable of developing emotional bonds nor exercising independent control of the Minotaur.

Name: Hardframe Body
Description:
A collection of salvaged components from a Sentinel Hardframe, reconditioned to fit the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid.

Will function as a semi-autonomous artificial pilot plugin. Installation allows the Minotaur to traverse planets itself and engage in combat or mining activities to support its primary operator.

The AI pilot will always cede control to the primary operator when they enter the cockpit.

Name: Fuel Inverter
Description: A piece of rechargeable power technology. The fuel inverter ensures an even flow of power to autonomous machines.

Name: Membrane Battery
Description: The membrane battery is an almost maintenance-free piece of rechargeable power technology. Nestled among in the machine's circuits, it supplies power safely and directly.

Name: Power Condenser
Description: A piece of rechargeable power technology. The power condenser harvests any heat energy wasted during the machine's operation, and uses it to generate extra power.

Name: Generator Coupling
Description: The generator coupling is an important piece of the machine's rechargeable power systems. Without it, the generator would fruitlessly spin, pumping power out into the void.

Name: Kinetic Dynamo
Description: The kinetic dynamo takes a small initial charge and uses it to run power-harvesting systems that tap into the orbit of the planet. This frees autonomous machinery from frequent fuel inspections, allowing them to endure extremely long maintenance cycles.

Name: Locking Mechanism
Description: A simple locking device, designed to keep out unauthorised pilferers. Damage has locked it permanently.

Name: Magnetic Lock
Description: An advanced locking device. A polarity incident has caused it to seal shut permanently.

Name: Superconductive Lock
Description: A highly advanced locking device. Damage to the circuits supplying the magnet has caused it to lock permanently.

Name: Input Terminal
Description: A terminal designed to allow manual control of the device. Damage prevents it actually receiving any input.

Name: Bio-input Sensor
Description: An advanced control unit, designed to allow device/flesh interaction. Damage prevents it functioning correctly. Interfacing while it is in this state is not advised.

Name: Boiler Unit
Description: A small boiler, generating heat to allow the device to function in difficult climates. A malfunction has resulted in a damaging boiler overflow.

Name: Tiny Motor
Description: A very small motor, designed to power very small parts. It has corroded, and is full of very small rust.

Name: Cooling System
Description: A pump and heat exchange system designed to keep the device from overheating. It has itself overheated, and is no longer functional.

Name: Output Screen
Description: A display terminal designed to communicate the device's status to the user. As the terminal is broken, the user cannot be made aware that the terminal is broken.

Name: Tamper Prevention Device
Description: A unit designed to destroy vital systems in the event that the device is tampered with by an unauthorised party. Unfortunately, it has itself malfunctioned and will continue to damage other systems until repaired.

Name: Security Alarm
Description: A small light/klaxon hybrid, designed to warn of unauthorised access to the device. Damage to the alarm has caused it to overload and short other nearby circuits.

Name: Spring Casing
Description: The casing for a high-compression spring. The casing has ruptured, causing the spring to shoot out and damage the rest of the device.

Name: Thermoregulator
Description: A control unit designed to keep temperatures even across the device. The sensor unit is damaged, causing it to vent or generate heat at inappropriate times.

Name: Fuel Pump
Description: A high-capacity pump, ensuring that fuel reaches every part of the device in all gravitational conditions. The filter is clogged with a strange substance, causing it to lose power.

Name: Servo Arm
Description: A small mechanical joint, used to correct small mechanical errors across the device. A malfunction is causing it to take functional components and push them into the wrong place, creating even more damage.

Name: Solenoid
Description: A relay switch, intended to aid the powering up of the device. The connectors have become corroded, and the solenoid is no longer functioning.

Name: Pressure Chamber
Description: A small pressurised chamber, designed to create the compressed gas necessary for the device to function. Cracks have appeared in the chamber, causing it to leak.

Name: Master Circuit
Description: The control circuit for all the other components in the device. Damage to this circuitry is fatal.

Name: Power Distributor
Description: The central power unit for the device. Damage to the unit means it is currently distributing all the power to one particular circuit, causing a dangerous short.

Name: Load Balancer
Description: A small unit designed to regulate the flow of power across the device. A malfunction is causing it to short, damaging other components.

Name: Network Interface
Description: A universal network interface, allowing the device to connect to a remote control centre. Damage to this interface is causing it to interpret background radiation as network signals, corrupting data in other circuits.

Name: Safety Panel
Description: The safety panel seals off potentially dangerous components in the event of a malfunction. An over sensitive trigger has caused it to activate, preventing the device from operating.

Name: Alternator
Description: The alternator generates and regulates power for the device. A strange corrosion seeps through it, preventing it from working.

Name: Photovoltaic Panel
Description: A small but efficient panel, designed to harvest light and convert it to power. However, the panel is now cracked and dusty, and can no longer be relied on.

Name: Transmission Box
Description: The gearing mechanism for the device. The lubricant that keeps it operational appears to have been replaced with an otherworldly green goo, and the gears are now stuck.

Name: GLYPH ONE
Description:
A solemn power radiates from this ancient carving. Though the imagery is simple and the rendering rough, the meaning of the glyph has mathematical precision.

This is glyph 1 of 16.

Name: GLYPH TWO
Description:
A solemn power radiates from this ancient carving. Though the imagery is simple and the rendering rough, the meaning of the glyph has mathematical precision.

This is glyph 2 of 16.

Name: GLYPH SIXTEEN
Description:

This is glyph 16 of 16.

Name: Portal Repository
Description:
A groove cut into the smooth grey stone of the Portal.

A light within pulses gently, expectant.

Name: Extractor Unit
Description:
Gathers resources directly from the interstellar medium, via a complex system of suction intakes and condensing tubes. The gathered substance varies with the local star classification.

Powered directly from the freighter's main electrical loop. Functionality is entirely autonomous.

Name: Bait Box
Description:
Insert bait or lures to attract specific fish, or to improve catch chances. Note: any foodstuff may be used as bait.

Current Bait: %BAIT%
Catch Rarity Improvement: %RARE_BOOST%%
Catch Size Improvement %SIZE_BOOST%%
Other notes: %NOTES%

Name: Ingestor Empty
Description:
The nutrient ingestor improves exosuit performance via the automatic portioning and processing of various cooked items.

Current Nutrition Source: %NAME%
Duration: %TIME%
Effect: %EFFECT%

Name: Refinery Output
Description: A hopper for storing the materials generated by the refinery

Name: Finished Dish
Description: A hopper for storing the materials generated by the refinery

Name: Furnace Tank
Description:
High-temperature burn unit, designed to consume a wide range of biological material. Insert materials to initiate burn.

When active, drives an internal turbine to generate power.

Name: Ancient Lock
Description: A mysterious lock with several keyholes, this relic protects what must surely be a valuable treasure.

Name: Pearl Offering
Description: The chest requires a Living Pearl, harvested from the giant mother-molluscs that grow on the ocean floor.

Name: Trident Key
Description: The chest requires a Trident Key, given to those who study the mysterious sites in the deep ocean.

Name: Tiny Motor
Description: A very small motor, designed to power very small parts. It has corroded, and is full of very small rust.

Name: Cooling System
Description: A pump and heat exchange system designed to keep the device from overheating. It has itself overheated, and is no longer functional.

Name: Thermoregulator
Description: A control unit designed to keep temperatures even across the device. The sensor unit is damaged, causing it to vent or generate heat at inappropriate times.

Name: Servo Arm
Description: A small mechanical joint, used to correct small mechanical errors across the device. A malfunction is causing it to take functional components and push them into the wrong place, creating even more damage.

Name: Solenoid
Description: A relay switch, intended to aid the powering up of the device. The connectors have become corroded, and the solenoid is no longer functioning.

Name: Pressure Chamber
Description: A small pressurised chamber, designed to create the compressed gas necessary for the device to function. Cracks have appeared in the chamber, causing it to leak.

Name: Master Circuit
Description: The control circuit for all the other components in the device. Damage to this circuitry is fatal.

Name: Power Distributor
Description: The central power unit for the device. Damage to the unit means it is currently distributing all the power to one particular circuit, causing a dangerous short.

Name: Photovoltaic Panel
Description: A small but efficient panel, designed to harvest light and convert it to power. However, the panel is now cracked and dusty, and can no longer be relied on.

Name: Transmission Box
Description: The gearing mechanism for the device. The lubricant that keeps it operational appears to have been replaced with an otherworldly green goo, and the gears are now stuck.

Name: Faulty Hologram
Description:
This Exosuit Upgrade Module is critically damaged. Repair systems to restore upgrade functionality.

If repaired, User will not be charged for any Exosuit Upgrades.

Name: Damaged Electrode
Description:
This Exosuit Upgrade Module is critically damaged. Repair systems to restore upgrade functionality.

If repaired, User will not be charged for any Exosuit Upgrades.

Name: Shattered Power Core
Description:
This Exosuit Upgrade Module is critically damaged. Repair systems to restore upgrade functionality.

If repaired, User will not be charged for any Exosuit Upgrades.

Name: GLYPH ONE
Description:
A solemn power radiates from this ancient carving. Though the imagery is simple and the rendering rough, the meaning of the glyph has mathematical precision.

The glyph burns with a resonant energy in the presence of Atlantideum

Name: GLYPH TWO
Description:
A solemn power radiates from this ancient carving. Though the imagery is simple and the rendering rough, the meaning of the glyph has mathematical precision.

The glyph burns with a resonant energy in the presence of Atlantideum

Name: GLYPH THREE
Description:
A solemn power radiates from this ancient carving. Though the imagery is simple and the rendering rough, the meaning of the glyph has mathematical precision.

The glyph burns with a resonant energy in the presence of Atlantideum

Name: Phalanged Node
Description:
This autophage is far from working order, but its subcomponents shows the signs of a previous repair attempt. With a few additional tweaks, the work might be completed...

Repair this component with REPAIR, or use PIN to locate the needed materials.

Name: Pressure Seal
Description:
This autophage is far from working order, but its subcomponents shows the signs of a previous repair attempt. With a few additional tweaks, the work might be completed...

Repair this component with REPAIR, or use PIN to locate the needed materials.

Description:

Name: Power Cells
Description:

Repair this component with REPAIR, or use PIN to locate the needed materials.

Name: Debris Rangefinder
Description:
A single-use device for locating the wreckage of starships in deep space.

Select the Rangefinder and Scan for Debris ([E]) to begin the location process.
